data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.2 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta 3
data.actual_result: Nothing happens when clicking on it. The push notification link only works when Discord is closed.
data.expected_result: It should redirect you to the new direct message.
data.short_description: Push notification link doesn't work while the app is opened
data.steps_to_repro: - Get any push notification for example for a new direct message - Do not click on this push notification - Open Discord but don't go to the new direct message - Now click on the push notification while Discord is opened
